# extent

**Instance Property**

The size of the reference object’s space-mapping data.

## Declaration

```swift
var extent: simd_float3 { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARWorldMap/extent] and [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARWorldMap/center] properties together define a bounding box for the data recorded in the reference object in its local coordinate system. You define that coordinate system with the transform parameter when calling `extractReferenceObject(transform:center:extent:)`, and can modify it by creating another reference object with [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARReferenceObject/applyingTransform(_:)].

## Examining a Reference Object

- **name**: A descriptive name for the reference object.
- **resourceGroupName**
- **center**: The center point of the reference object’s space-mapping data.
- **scale**: A scale factor for the local coordinate space the reference object defines.
